concept-wr.title: System Configuration Management Overview
concept-wr.shortdesc: Much of the system configuration data is specified as bootstrap-type configuration data defined during software installation, using the config_controller script. After installation, you can change this system configuration data, as well as additional system configuration data, using the web administration interface or the CLI.

conbody.p: There are a few exceptions to bootstrap system configuration data, specified at install time, that can NOT be changed afterwards; one should ensure these configurations are correct otherwise a system re-install is required. This configuration data includes: product type (Standard vs CPE), presence of a pxeboot network, management network subnet and subnet range, infrastructure network subnet and subnet range, and use of secure external connections.
